Hero.intro: Hi, I’m <name>SharkLian</name>, a Senior Frontend Developer based in Taiwan. I specialize in scalable <react>React (Vite)</react> architecture, with <nest>NestJS</nest> capabilities for full-stack integration.
Hero.philosophy: I thrive on complex logic. My toolbox allows me to choose the best tech for your needs—whether it's <tailwind>Tailwind CSS</tailwind> for a pixel-perfect custom UI, or <antd>Ant Design (AntD)</antd> / <mui>MUI</mui> for rapid enterprise dashboard development.

annotation.title: Interactive Annotation Interfaces
annotation.desc: Precise 2D image labeling tools (Canvas/SVG) for AI workflows.

admin.title: Enterprise Admin Panels
admin.desc: Streamlining data workflows and permission management.

Hero.closing: My coding style is like a shark—clean, efficient, and precise. If you need a robust internal tool, I deliver solutions that work.

Services.label: Services
Services.title: Technically Challenging Work Only.
Services.description: I don't build simple brochure websites. I build the engines that run your business.

visualization.title: Complex Data Visualization
visualization.desc: Transforming raw analytics into interactive, decision-making dashboards using D3.js and Recharts.

api.title: Scalable API Architecture
api.desc: Designing high-concurrency Node.js/NestJS backends that handle 50k+ requests per second.

legacy.title: Legacy System Refactoring
legacy.desc: Modernizing monolithic codebases into modular micro-frontends without downtime.

FeaturedWork.label: Featured Work
FeaturedWork.title: Engineering Code Case Studies
FeaturedWork.status_desc: Technical demos are currently under construction.
FeaturedWork.placeholder_desc: I am currently consolidating my commercial experience into sanitized, open-source template repositories. These will demo high-performance architectures without violating NDAs.

fintech.title: High-Frequency Trading Dashboard
fintech.desc: Built a real-time visualization engine for a prop trading firm utilizing WebSockets and WebGL for sub-millisecond updates.

ai.title: LLM Model Fine-tuning Interface
ai.desc: Developed the drag-and-drop workflow editor for engineers to chain prompt sequences and evaluate model outputs.

logistics.title: Global Supply Chain Monitor
logistics.desc: Legacy modernization of a 15-year old JSP system into a modern React application, handling millions of shipment records.

AboutProcess.title: How I Work
AboutProcess.description: Software development is a team sport. Here is my playbook.

discovery.title: Discovery & Strategy
discovery.desc: We analyze your business goals, user needs, and technical constraints to define the perfect solution.

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.desc: I design scalable database schemas and API patterns before writing a single line of code.

development.title: Agile Development
development.desc: Iterative sprints with regular demos. You see progress every week, not just at the deadline.

deployment.title: Fast Deployment
deployment.desc: Streamlined build and deployment processes for rapid delivery to production.
